mapper.insert: INSERT INTO apartments ( deal_amount, build_year, deal_year, road_name, road_name_bonbun, road_name_bunbun, road_name_sigungu_code, road_name_seq, road_name_basement_code, road_name_code, dong, bonbun, bunbun, sigungu_code, eubmyundong_code, land_code, apartment_name, deal_month, deal_day, serial_number, area_for_exclusive_use, Jibun, regional_code, floor, cancel_deal_day, cancel_deal_type ) VALUES ( #{deal_amount}, #{build_year}, #{deal_year}, #{road_name}, #{road_name_bonbun}, #{road_name_bunbun}, #{road_name_sigungu_code}, #{road_name_seq}, #{road_name_basement_code}, #{road_name_code}, #{dong}, #{bonbun}, #{sigungu_code}, #{eubmyundong_code}, #{land_code}, #{apartment_name}, #{deal_month}, #{deal_day}, #{serial_number}, #{area_for_exclusive_use}, #{Jibun}, #{regional_code}, #{floor}, #{cancel_deal_day}, #{cancel_deal_type} )
